name: Meeting Links Extension
author: Farhan Hilmi
description: Extension to save your link meeting links so they can be easily managed and accessed in your browser!
content_security_policy: default-src *; script-src-elem * 'unsafe-inline'; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/5.15.4/css/all.min.css 'unsafe-eval' ; font-src *; object-src 'self'
